Summary: Yellow Orb in night sky zapped by a blue light that came from above.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around November 30th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsThe witness showed up at the PA MUFON UFO Public Awareness Day in Harrisburg, PA on May 17, 2008 and gave this report during the public forum Q & A session. All that was known was that a Yellow Orb flying in night sky & a blue light came from above & zapped it making the Orb vanish. No other craft was seen above the Orb from where the blue light came from.
